page.title: 12Cropping List: Easton Lodge
page.content:
Sugarbeet {188 acres }Maize {51 acres Fodderbeet { 9 acres }Rape {55 acres Potatoes {12 acres }Pasture{91 acres Marshland {198 acres }Pigs {43 acres Win. Barl.{353 acres }Spr.Bar{166 cres Win.Wheat {188 acres Total Acreage{1354
Machinery: Every worker has a{tractor for his own use which he has to keep maintained. There is also a{combine {harvester, sugarbeet harvester, {plough, harrow}and all other necessary farming machines.
Animals Kept:{Pigs, cattle & Sheep The amount kept on farm varies annualy
Game: Many species of animals are bred to provide some sport for owner. {Pigeons, rabbits, and foxes are pests and are hunted by parties each year.
